item.title: New Container: Piwigo
item.description: We have released a new container for Piwigo! Piwigo is a photo gallery software for the web that comes with powerful features to publish and manage your collection of pictures.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Piwigo!

Piwigo is a photo gallery software for the web that comes with powerful features to publish and manage your collection of pictures.
